Zend Web API

The Zend Server Web API is intended to allow automation of the management and deployment of Zend Server and Zend Server Cluster Manager, and allow integration with other Zend or 3rd party software. Particularly, the Zend Server Web API is seen as a mean of bridging the gap between Infrastructures as a Service (IAAS) cloud environments, such as Amazon EC2 or VMWare vCloud, and Platform as a Service (PAAS) cloud environments.
